DOC.brief_summary: To compare effect different airway clearance technique lung ventilation electrical impedance tomography .
DOC.criteria: > 18 year old Surgery anesthesia ( PEP incentive spirometry ) healthy subject Intervention time first bed lift Cooperative Can perform device technique correctly Patients pacemaker , implantable pump automatic implantable cardioverter defibrillator Patients pulmonary disease ( acute chronic ) Patients cognitive problem Presence patch wound EIT belt zone placement Patients initial pain > 2/10 Patients severe obesity ( BMI > 35 )
